articles.content: The worrisome South African strain of coronavirus, which appears to be more contagious and more resistant to some vaccines, has surfaced in California, and the first two cases are Bay Area residents.… [+6214 chars]

articles.title: Researchers unravel what makes someone a COVID-19 superspreader - Medical Xpress
